tool_description: Easy & Fast way of generating hashtags for any image given for any social media posts(Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest, etc...)
name: Instagram Hashtags Generator
title: Instagram Hashtags Generator

api_list.name: Get Image based hashtags
api_list.description:
Get a comprehensive list of hashtags based on the image you are sending.

Image must be a regular JPEG or PNG image. Usually such images have extensions: .jpg, .jpeg, .png. The service checks input file by MIME type ...

required_parameters.name: image_url
required_parameters.description: The image url you want to get hashtags for

optional_parameters.name: max_labels
optional_parameters.description: Max number of hashtags to detect
